name: Flood (itch) (OrianK, NadavBaruch, giladbin, ereldebel)
description:
Protect your islands!
Stop the enemies from reaching the water.

Controls:

Move the mouse left and right to rotate the camera. Aim the gun and use the left mouse button to shoot.

Credits:

Designers: Nadav Baruch, Orian Kidron
Developers: Erel Debel, Gilad Binshtok
Guidance: Dani Bacon, Itamar Ernst, Mati Ernst, Nir Lahad, Omer Zadok

Sound Effects By:

newlocknew, notchfilter, ironcross32 & Jofae

The game was made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design & Hebrew University, 2022.
